# AppArmor profile for replicaset-harbor-jobservice
profile replicaset-harbor-jobservice-profile flags=(attach_disconnected,mediate_deleted) {
  #include <tunables/global>
  # Executable: /harbor/entrypoint.sh
  /harbor/entrypoint.sh \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
  # Executable: /harbor/harbor_jobservice
  /harbor/harbor_jobservice \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
  # Executable: /harbor/install_cert.sh
  /harbor/install_cert.sh \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
  # Executable: /usr/bin/cp
  /usr/bin/cp \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
  # Executable: /usr/bin/dirname
  /usr/bin/dirname \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
  # Executable: /usr/bin/find
  /usr/bin/find \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
  # Executable: /usr/bin/grep
  /usr/bin/grep \{
    capability DAC_OVERRIDE,
    capability DAC_READ_SEARCH,
    capability NET_ADMIN,
  }
}
